SELECT `order`.id AS order_id, `order`.customer_location, `order`.appointment_time, `order`.actual_photos, `order`.unit_price, `order`.recycle_weigh, `order`.accept_time, `order`.arrive_time, `order`.status, `order`.cancel_message, `order`.cancel_time, `order`.service_overtime_penalty, `order`.customer_late_cancellation_fee, `order`.recycler_late_cancellation_fee, `order`.remark, `order`.order_contact_person, `order`.order_contact_phone, `order`.estimated_total_amount, `order`.expect_recycler_platform_amount, `order`.expect_customer_platform_amount, `order`.create_time,
`recycler`.id AS recycler_id, `recycler`.name AS recycler_name,
`category`.id AS category_id, `category`.category_name,
`bill`.id AS bill_id, `bill`.real_order_recycle_amount, `bill`.real_recycler_amount, `bill`.real_recycler_platform_amount, `bill`.recycler_overtime_charges, `bill`.real_customer_recycle_amount, `bill`.real_customer_platform_amount, `bill`.recycler_coupon_amount, `bill`.customer_coupon_amount, `bill`.pay_time,
`comment`.id AS comment_id, `comment`.rate, `comment`.review_content, `comment`.create_time AS comment_time
FROM order_info AS `order` LEFT JOIN yueyishou_recycler.recycler_info AS `recycler` ON `order`.recycler_id = `recycler`.id LEFT JOIN yueyishou_category.category_info AS `category` ON `order`.son_category_id = `category`.id LEFT JOIN order_bill AS `bill` ON `order`.id = `bill`.order_id LEFT JOIN order_comment AS `comment` ON `order`.id = `comment`.order_id
AND `order`.status = #{orderMgrQueryForm.status}
AND `order`.order_contact_person LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderMgrQueryForm.orderContactPerson}, '%')
AND `order`.appointment_time LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderMgrQueryForm.appointmentTime}, '%')
AND `recycler`.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderMgrQueryForm.recyclerName}, '%')
